articles.title: Colorado officer found guilty in Elijah McClain death
articles.description: Another officer was acquitted by a jury in the death of McClain, a young black man who died in 2019.
articles.content: A Colorado officer has been found guilty of criminally negligent homicide in the death of 23-year-old Elijah McClain, while another was acquitted.
